description: This file contains implementation of cryptographic signing functions for a public key cryptography module, specifically related to DSA and RSA signing operations as part of the SSL/EAY cryptographic library.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayDSASign(PVOID pDataToSign,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,PULONG pulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Generates a DSA signature for the provided data, but currently returns failure, implemented as a stub.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSASignWithType(int nHashMethod,PVOID pDataToSign,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pSignature,PULONG pulSizeOfSignature,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Performs RSA signing with a specified hash method, but currently returns failure, implemented as a stub.
